description:
***This is NOT a job at ForceBrands*** Must be able to be onsite in Brooklyn 3 days a week
Responsibilities: * Oversee co-manufacturing and raw material warehousing sites, handling both strategic and operational activities * Manage supplier relationships, set stock targets, and control costs while identifying cost-saving opportunities * Collaborate with Demand Planning, Customer Supply, and Materials Planning teams to ensure production schedules align with forecasts * Lead problem-solving initiatives and communicate solutions effectively. * Support NPD projects and represent the brand in supplier engagements * Optimize financial processes and KPI performance * Manage a team of 5+ members Candidate Profile: * Proven experience in supply chain management * Strong background in people management, with the ability to mentor and lead a team effectively * Familiarity with supply chain management tools, NetSuite preferred * Experience in the beverage or food industry is required * Willingness to travel as needed and take a proactive approach to problem-solving
